name: FiberStar® C
description: FiberStar® C is a cold-water soluble, low viscosity, non-ionic polymer for use in industrial applications. FiberStar C is a natural polysaccharide designed to impart enhanced functional properties including: adhesion/binding, water retention, improved rheology and viscosity. FiberStar C is an excellent product for binding and adhesive applications where economics is important. FiberStar C is a cost-effective corn-based product with excellent binding and adhesion properties
